title: Signing up and creating an account
content: Hello, I'm fairly new to Firefox. As soon as Chrome disabled ad-blockers,migrated from it. Two of my most used accounts, my personal and school, were transferred. Most schools in my area use a different email address than the official department of education email. In recent months, my school has opted to disable the school's made email and switch everything to the school's official email address. My account was created by clicking the create account button on the about profiles page[http://example.com . There was a problem creating a new account. I don't remember the error message. My school said it was already made, I just needed to sign in. There was an error message saying 'Primary account required for sign in'. I know the email address and reset my password to the default, but it still doesn't work. Is there anything I can do?

title: VRBO and Airbnb websites being blocked in log-in
content:

Even after dumping cache and cookies (like 3 times we cleared the cache, etc), there is no change. We had to start using Edge... (which we despise). Please look for a remedy.

The blockage is just a recycle of the log-in page after entering user/passw. It empties the user ID and refreshes the page. We try again with the same result.

The wife uses Chrome on her Chromebook and it doesn't have the blockage or issue... works okay.

Thank you.

title: Problem with European Patent Office (EPO) Smartcards
content:
Hello, we're happy firefox users within our patent attorneys' offices', but recently we have problems using our smartcards in firefox, especially for tasks to "renew" smartcards or other simple tasks which used to work with firefox. In Chrome or EDGE, we have no problems with this.

The problem is as follows: 1. Insert the smartcard 2. The cryptovision driver recognizes the smartcard 3. Call the url http://nrm2.epoline.org/myepoline/pcf/insertSCRenewal.html?siteLanguage=de 4. Firefox asks for the "certificate" (see screenshot) 5. After selecting the certificate, usually the PIN Input dialog form is displayed, but here nothing happens 6. After a while, you get an error that the url could not be loaded (timeout)

In earlier versions of firefox, the smartcards worked better. What is going wrong?
creator: it-technik

title: Account creation and signing in
content: Hello, I'm relatively new to Firefox. I migrated from chrome when they decided to disable ad-blockers. I transferred the 2 accounts i use the most, my personal and school account. My school uses a different email address to the official department of education email provided by most schools in my area. Now recently, my school has decided to transfer everything to the official email and disable the school made email. I went to the about profiles page and pressed create account. I tried creating a new account and it didn't work. i forget the error message given. I went to my school and they said that it's already made, you just need to sign in. I tried and it gave me an error message saying 'Primary account required for sign in' I know the email and had my password reset to the default an it still isn't working. What can I do?

title: Firefox fails

title: History locked in time
content:
Websites browsing history does not update or delete. Opening the sidebar, right clicking on an entry and using Forget About this site or Delete Page has no effect. Menu>Settings>Privacy. Remember Browsing History and it doesn't update when I open the sidebar. Last Visited is the only selection that shows any sites and it doesn't update as I browse new sites. By Date and Site, Most Visited, by site, by date do not show any sites.

I've even uninstalled Firefox and reinstalled and not sure how but it has the same history as well as last tabs opened.
